document.full_text: egyptians living abroad will, for the first time, be able to vote in parliamentary and presidential elections due this year after the ouster of president hosni mubarak, the cabinet said on wednesday.
document.title: egypt agrees to allow egyptians living abroad to vote
lines_and_colors: egyptians living abroad will, for the first time, be able to vote in parliamentary and presidential elections due this year after the ouster of president hosni mubarak, the cabinet said on wednesday.
